To  bookings@saintpetersburghotel99.ru
From  isabel.crane@craneeconmists.co.uk
Subject  Booking: 4-8 January ______________________________________________________________________________ Dear Sir or Madam I would like to book three double rooms at your hotel for four nights from 4-8 January. Could you also order a taxi from the airport on 4 January? We are arriving in Saint Petersburg at 20.00 local time. I would also like to book a table for dinner in the hotel restaurant for the evening of 4 January. I saw on your website that there are several meeting rooms at the hotel. Is there one available on 5 January? We are going to have an all-day meeting that day for twenty people. Thank you very much for your help. Yours faithfully Isabel Crane
